tags: it would be a beautiful wedding tho
please add on if you can think of anything
summary: Okay, but EraserMic brethren, can I just get real for a moment, like, I see so many portraying them as married but I see no one...
body:
Okay, but EraserMic brethren, can I just get real for a moment, like, I see so many portraying them as married but I see no one - and I mean NO ONE! Talking about what their wedding would be like, cuz… Wow. That would be both a blessing and a curse, beautiful disaster, right there.

Eri would be the flower girl, you know throwing flowers across the path or something, maybe holding the rings. Who knows.

All of Aizawa’s 23 adopted kids (class a, eri, shinsho, and Mirio) would be there, becuz of course they wouldn’t miss this for the world, alright?

Mic would look fabulous, ok? He would be in a freaking tux, tie and all! His shades and headphones are still there tho.

And of course, of course, Aizawa. Because we all know that this adorkable dad would look freaking AMAZING! He would be dressed up! Tux jacket, hair tied up and all that shit. Then, and THEN! He would come walking out in some ugly ass sweatpants, probably pink, or with cats on them as if it was the most normal thing in the world. (probably wearing slippers as well, or sandals, becuz why the fudge not, right? Or freaking crocs)

And I just… Someone needs to draw this becuz I’m too busy laughing right now to even be able to reach for the pen XD

Eri would be the flower girl, you know throwing flowers across the path or something, maybe holding the rings. Who knows.

All of Aizawa’s 23 adopted kids (class a, eri, shinsho, and Mirio) would be there, becuz of course they wouldn’t miss this for the world, alright?

Mic would look fabulous, ok? He would be in a freaking tux, tie and all! His shades and headphones are still there tho.

And of course, of course, Aizawa. Because we all know that this adorkable dad would look freaking AMAZING! He would be dressed up! Tux jacket, hair tied up and all that shit. Then, and THEN! He would come walking out in some ugly ass sweatpants, probably pink, or with cats on them as if it was the most normal thing in the world. (probably wearing slippers as well, or sandals, becuz why the fudge not, right? Or freaking crocs)

And I just… Someone needs to draw this becuz I’m too busy laughing right now to even be able to reach for the pen XD

title: Suicidal s/o feat Baku part 3
body:
Venting cause I feel like shit. This is kinda like me talking to myself through a character.

Warnings: Suicide attempt and other surrounding topics.

You were laying in a hospital bed, looking at the ceiling. Some machine was whirring and making little machine noises next to you. It was probably the morphine dispenser. You weren’t quite sure if the numbness you were feeling was because of the drugs they were pumping into you, or if it was just your normal state nowadays.

Both your wrist were wrapped in thick white bandages. Beneath them laid the wounds you had inflicted upon yourself the previous night. Deep gashes now marked your wrists. You remembered when, they had stitched you up, the blood had been everywhere. Your clothes, the table, the nurses’ clothes and hands. It felt like the whole world had been stained dark red for just a moment. You liked that red, maybe you’d see it again some day.

Your thoughts were interrupted when someone crashed through the door. You didn’t even have to look to see who it was. You wondered when he would get tired of your shit and leave… Like everyone else.

“Are you a fucking idiot, huh?” he growled as he marched to your bed. “You should’ve called me, you fuckin dumbass” he shouted.

Bakugou went with the first emotion that came, anger. He was angry at you for doing something so stupid, but he was more angry with himself. Why didn’t he see this coming? How the hell did he miss the signs? Was he so preoccupied with that stupid school that he didn’t realize his partner was planning  to kill themselves.

You didn’t flinch at his yelling, you knew he was angry, but you couldn’t really understand why. Why was he angry at you for wanting to end the pain? It annoyed you that you didn’t seem to comprehend his feelings.

“You can’t just try to fuckin leave like that” he growled and grabbed your shoulders to make you look at him.

“Why not? Why am I not allowed to make it stop?” you asked absent mindedly, looking at him with a blank yet questioning expression.

“Because it won’t stop the pain. It just moves it to your family, to your friends… to me”

“So I’m supposed to keep hurting, so no one else has to?”

“Fuck no, no of course you don’t need to keep hurting” he said.

You felt abnormally cold beneath his fingers, even through the thin fabric of the hospital clothes. Now that he really looked at you, you were really pale, he had seen the same symptoms on people with extreme blood loss. Your wrists were bandaged and there was an IV hooked up to your right arm, probably so you’d get back the fluids you had lost.

“Why do I have to live this way? Katsuki why?! I don’t feel anything anymore, I’m so totally numb you wouldn’t believe it, and at the same time all I feel is pain” you ranted and pushed his hands off of your shoulders, leaning farther away from him on the bed. “Tell me one reason I should keep going” you pleaded.

Honestly you wanted a reason, something to hold on to, but still you knew there was nothing he could say to make that happen.

“Because I fuckin love you, I love you more than anything” he said desperately, taking your hand.

“You’re lying” you sniffled, “ No one loves me. I’m broken Katsuki. Damaged goods, and no one can ever fix me. I’m in a million little pieces and I don’t deserve to be loved, because tho-those pieces are sharp and they only hurt-hurt people, I-I hurt people Katsuki and I don’t want to hurt you” you started sobbing.

Bakugou his arms around you, and you buried your face to his shoulder. You cried that ugly, loud, yelling snotty cry, while Bakugou petted your head gently and held you.

“I don’t mind a little hurt you know? Hell, you could never hurt me, unless you hurt yourself. And if lovin each of those million pieces is what it takes, then I’m gonna love them all. I love you so fuckin much, no matter how broken or damaged you feel, cause to me, you’re perfect”

I’m in a million little pieces and I don’t deserve to be loved, because tho-those pieces are sharp and they only hurt-hurt people, I-I hurt people Katsuki and I don’t want to hurt you” you started sobbing.

Bakugou his arms around you, and you buried your face to his shoulder. You cried that ugly, loud, yelling snotty cry, while Bakugou petted your head gently and held you.

“I don’t mind a little hurt you know? Hell, you could never hurt me, unless you hurt yourself. And if lovin each of those million pieces is what it takes, then I’m gonna love them all. I love you so fuckin much, no matter how broken or damaged you feel, cause to me, you’re perfect”
trail.content:
Venting cause I feel like shit. This is kinda like me talking to myself through a character.

Warnings: Suicide attempt and other surrounding topics.

You were laying in a hospital bed, looking at the ceiling. Some machine was whirring and making little machine noises next to you. It was probably the morphine dispenser. You weren’t quite sure if the numbness you were feeling was because of the drugs they were pumping into you, or if it was just your normal state nowadays.

Both your wrist were wrapped in thick white bandages. Beneath them laid the wounds you had inflicted upon yourself the previous night. Deep gashes now marked your wrists. You remembered when, they had stitched you up, the blood had been everywhere. Your clothes, the table, the nurses’ clothes and hands. It felt like the whole world had been stained dark red for just a moment. You liked that red, maybe you’d see it again some day.

Your thoughts were interrupted when someone crashed through the door. You didn’t even have to look to see who it was. You wondered when he would get tired of your shit and leave… Like everyone else.

“Are you a fucking idiot, huh?” he growled as he marched to your bed. “You should’ve called me, you fuckin dumbass” he shouted.

Bakugou went with the first emotion that came, anger. He was angry at you for doing something so stupid, but he was more angry with himself. Why didn’t he see this coming? How the hell did he miss the signs? Was he so preoccupied with that stupid school that he didn’t realize his partner was planning  to kill themselves.

You didn’t flinch at his yelling, you knew he was angry, but you couldn’t really understand why. Why was he angry at you for wanting to end the pain? It annoyed you that you didn’t seem to comprehend his feelings.

“You can’t just try to fuckin leave like that” he growled and grabbed your shoulders to make you look at him.

“Why not? Why am I not allowed to make it stop?” you asked absent mindedly, looking at him with a blank yet questioning expression.

“Because it won’t stop the pain. It just moves it to your family, to your friends… to me”

“So I’m supposed to keep hurting, so no one else has to?”

“Fuck no, no of course you don’t need to keep hurting” he said.

You felt abnormally cold beneath his fingers, even through the thin fabric of the hospital clothes. Now that he really looked at you, you were really pale, he had seen the same symptoms on people with extreme blood loss. Your wrists were bandaged and there was an IV hooked up to your right arm, probably so you’d get back the fluids you had lost.

“Why do I have to live this way? Katsuki why?! I don’t feel anything anymore, I’m so totally numb you wouldn’t believe it, and at the same time all I feel is pain” you ranted and pushed his hands off of your shoulders, leaning farther away from him on the bed. “Tell me one reason I should keep going” you pleaded.

Honestly you wanted a reason, something to hold on to, but still you knew there was nothing he could say to make that happen.

“Because I fuckin love you, I love you more than anything” he said desperately, taking your hand.

“You’re lying” you sniffled, “ No one loves me. I’m broken Katsuki. Damaged goods, and no one can ever fix me. I’m in a million little pieces and I don’t deserve to be loved, because tho-those pieces are sharp and they only hurt-hurt people, I-I hurt people Katsuki and I don’t want to hurt you” you started sobbing.

Bakugou his arms around you, and you buried your face to his shoulder. You cried that ugly, loud, yelling snotty cry, while Bakugou petted your head gently and held you.

“I don’t mind a little hurt you know? Hell, you could never hurt me, unless you hurt yourself. And if lovin each of those million pieces is what it takes, then I’m gonna love them all. I love you so fuckin much, no matter how broken or damaged you feel, cause to me, you’re perfect”
